My suburban is great for hauling home improvement supplies, but the weather's not cooperating.

i am an amateur chef who cooks 5 different cuisines.
i aspire to paint murals.

content.text: Hey! Doing okay, how about you?
Pretty good, just got home from work.
I work as a server at a restaurant. What about you?
I'm an amateur chef, and I love to cook. Do you like to cook?
I used to cook a lot more, but I've been so busy lately that I haven't had much time. What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love making all kinds of food, but I'm especially good at making pasta. I'm also really into making murals.
Oh, that's really cool! I can't even draw a stick figure, let alone paint a mural.
It's not as hard as it looks. I've been practicing for years, and I'm still learning.
Well, it looks amazing to me. What's your favorite mural that you've ever painted?
I think my favorite mural is the one I painted in my friend's living room. It's a beautiful scene of a forest, and it's really peaceful to look at.
That sounds beautiful! I'd love to see it sometime.
Maybe I'll post a picture of it on Instagram sometime.
That would be awesome! I'd love to see it
